title: Terraspark Boots
summaries: The Terraspark Boots are a pre-Hardmode accessory crafted by combining Frostspark Boots and Lava Waders at a Tinkerer's Workshop, providing the benefits of both items. They are the final upgrade of the Hermes/Sailfish/Flurry/Dunerider and Water Walking Boots.

statistics.Tooltip:
Allows flight, super fast running, and extra mobility on ice
8% increased movement speed
Provides the ability to walk on water, honey & lava
Grants immunity to fire blocks and 7 seconds of immunity to lava
Reduces damage from touching lava
statistics.Sell: 15
